rules_text:
Tap all creatures target player controls. Muse 1. [i](Choose a counter on a permanent you control or a card you own in in exile. Remove it or add another.)[/i]
Flashback {4}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
notes:
WU Enchantments
UB Exile control
UR Double spell
GU Muse
